text: (( that sounds great! the more wrapping the better if you ask me.

Honestly it’d be hilarious if there were so many layers that they didn’t even finish unwrapping at first. Like the very top layer just looks like regular gift wrap but then there’s a day or two where whatever is under it the person thinks that’s the gift. Like a Russian doll of different uses.
(( I like the sound of that! It'd also be torture for the poor Matsu who's forced to endure immobility, blindness, and near-deafness for a whole day.
There’s one point where they think it’s a footrest, then they flip him on his back and maybe it’s supposed to be a basket and hold things
(( meanwhile the Matsu is sweating from all the layers of mummification, probably unable to even get a quiet whimper out from the sheer amount of layers covering his mouth

I feel like by the time they actually got down to the puppy, the Matsu would be a complete sweetheart because this is as close as he’s going to get to being free again and he’s so excited to move around again
(( that'd be really cute! so, what Matsu do you think would be a fun fit?
I think Totty would be really great for this one.
(( I agree! Would you be ok with posting in the directory?
Yeah I’ll put it in now!
It’s in
(( responded!
Great!

(( looking over that Totty rp is a delight. I really like the idea of permanent bondage combined with immobility and sensory deprivation. maybe sometime we could make one specific chat for a few oneshot RPs centered on the concept? I'd imagine they'd be oneshots since, well, the isolation and bondage would be permanent
I can get into that
(( great!
Mmhm!
(( I hope to respond to our RPs sometime soon, maybe over the weekend. I've been a little busy
Take your time! I might not reply on the weekend since I have a show to run and it’s my birthday on Sunday
(( happy early birthday!
Thanks!
(( hey! gonna try to respond tonight, thanks for your patience!
No problem! I know how it gets

Hey I think I have a cool new idea? What if a Matsu was kidnapped and woke up in a “hospital” in a full body cast that was designed to put him into a certain position. We could paint it up to make him look like whatever he’s supposed to be. And if we wanted to include other Matsus we could have different cast shapes (maybe even ones involving multiple Matsus) and maybe one has a more mobile role in their new owner’s house so they have to see all their brothers?

(( oh, that sounds really cool! Would most of them be completely immobile and isolated and put on display while the mobile one is forced to see them? I also like the idea of the casts having scanning tech so their owners can see their expressions and positions. Maybe they can just barely squirm and scream, but there's no way to tell they're moving through the cast.

As for casts involving multiple Matsus, maybe the two we choose could be forced in some kind of 69 position or forced to kiss through a shared rubber mask or dildo
